job description:
Job Title:Finance Data Analyst

Location:Foster City, CA

Duration:2 Months

Description:
Provide financial data analysis and metrics / auditing (Concur, Oracle)

Must Have Skills:
  • 4-6yrs experience in Financial Data Analyst (metrics & data analytics)- Auditing experience- Oracle- Concur- Excel (pivot table)
    Nice To Have Skills:
  • Big 4 consulting experience- Salesforce- SQL- Sharepoint- CISA- CPA
Job Type: Contract

Experience:
  • Financial Data Analyst: 3 years (Required)
